name: Hitman 3 VR: Reloaded
description:
In HITMAN 3 VR: Reloaded Agent 47 returns as the world’s top assassin for the most important contracts of his entire career.
Rebuilt from the ground up for VR, HITMAN 3 VR: Reloaded marks a significant milestone in the HITMAN series, leveraging the power of Meta Quest 3 to deliver an unparalleled, untethered, and unrivalled VR experience.

name: The Orange
description: In a forgotten universe lies a legendary orange: the Orange of Infinity. Press it to shape existence itself and confront the darkness.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine II - Ultra Edition
description: Pre-order the Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 Ultra Edition to receive the Macragge’s Chosen DLC and play up to 4 days before release.The Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 Ultra Edition includes the base game, the Ultramarines Champion DLC and the Season Pass.Embody the superhuman skill and brutality of a Space Marine and defend the Imperium in spectacular third-person action in solo or multiplayer modes.

name: Furry Shakespeare: To Date Or Not To Date Spooky Cat Girls 2?!
description: Straight from the fright factory comes three SPOOKY games in one! Date demons from the center of the planet! Save a spooky theme park! Smash some faces in as giant Kaiju!

name: Mythic Trials
description: Mythic Trials is a competitive Hack'n'Slash in which every player will create their unique skill build. It includes hundreds of Solo trials, Battle Royale PvP, Diablo-like item loots, daily World Bosses, rankings, draft tournaments, and dozens of different skills and is playable on mobile.

name: Astral Vangard
description: Pilot your Vangard and battling against various enemies and bosses. Astral Vangard is a casual game with rogue-like elements in a futuristic world filled with Mecha. You can choose their own Vangard with different start weapon and characteristics, improving their abilities as they advance.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine II - Gold Edition
description: Pre-order the Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 Gold Edition to receive the Macragge&rsquos Chosen DLC and play up to 3 days before release.About the early unlock:The early unlock is not guaranteed for Canada territory.Please make sure to check the shipping time when you place your order to ensure delivery before the release.Day one delivery is not guaranteed with standard shipping option.The Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 Gold Edition includes the base game Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2, the Season Pass and an exclusive Steelbook.Embody the superhuman skill and brutality of a Space Marine. Unleash deadly abilities and devastating weaponry to obliterate the relentless Tyranid swarms. Defend the Imperium in spectacular third-person action in solo or co-op modes.

name: Greed Series
description: Discover mysterious secrets and attempted sabotage in the Greed Series bundle!

name: Paper Dash: Las Vegas
description: Jump into "Paper Dash – Las Vegas", where your paper plane takes flight through the dazzling lights and vibrant nights of the city that never sleeps. Fly, glide, dash, scare away ghosts, and enjoy a peaceful journey, facing the ghosts of greed in exciting, relaxing, and jaw-dropping environments.

name: Castle of Lord Velimir
description: Epic battle against encroaching darkness. It is a baby from Warcraft 3, Dark Souls and Super Mario bros. Don't ask, it was wild party.

name: The Christopher Redemption: I
description: The Christopher redemption part I is a story-driven action thriller game that explores the intense and original story of Christopher and his sister.

name: Ale & Tale Tavern
description: Get ready for a thrilling mix of genres: a cooperative, first-person, open-world fantasy tavern simulator, action, fishing, hunting, exploration, and completing fun and diverse quests. And, of course, cooking! Play with friends, feed and quench the thirst of the entire world!

name: Astro Link
description: Astro Link is a Portal-like puzzle game that takes place withing the mysterious Astro Link facility. What is happening to this place? Will test subject #602 be able to find out?

name: Boyhood's End
description: Boyhood's End is an adventure game following Giovanni, the boy with the lowest human score in the universe, and Campanella, the delinquent genius, and their journey on the galactic railroad regarding the "human" and "inhuman".

name: Shogun Showdown
description: Shogun Showdown is a turn-based combat game with rogue-like and deck-building elements. Position yourself and attack at the right time, upgrade your tiles and combo them to get ready to face the Shogun!

name: Garlant: My Story
description: I am an adventurer who just graduated from college. In pursuit of the challenge, I came to the distant border of the Kingdom: the town of Garlant in the Doly region. I will write a new chapter in my life here. It will be a wonderful adventure story.

name: Corpus Edax
description: Corpus Edax is a first-person-melee RPG enveloped in an immersive-sim design philosophy. Set in newly built city on a distant planet, create your character and make your own choices in a reactive world - fight, talk or sneak your way out of confrontation. Your decision, is the right decision.

name: Paper Ghost Stories: Third Eye Open
description: Third Eye Open is a third person narrative adventure rendered in a distinctive "paper theatre" aesthetic. Set in early 2000s Malaysia, the player takes the role of Ting, a young girl trying to come to terms with the burgeoning power inside her.

name: Cato: Buttered Cat
description: Buttered cat paradox puzzle platformer game

name: Xpressorcist
description: A Exorcism Simulator! Take the role of an Xpressorcist (Express Exorcist) and exorcise as many people as possible with out running out of time and accidentally blowing them up!!

name: Hard Glide
description: This is an arcade-style inertial skill-shooter with mouse control only.

name: Demon's Mirror
description: A rogue like deck builder combined with a strategic match-3 battler. Use cards to attack and defend against the enemy, manipulate tiles on the board, and gain ever increasing powers as you traverse into a world filled with your worst nightmares.

name: Selfloss
description: Selfloss is an emotional exploration game filled with rich lore, set in a whale-worshipping, Slavic-inspired world. Embark on the journey of the healer, Kazimir, and his magical staff as he fights a mysterious Miasma in search of a ritual to cure his wounded soul.

name: 3xtinction: Deluxe Edition
description: 3xtinction is an Online Co-op Top Down Shooter with tactical and strategic elements. After a series of experiments on spiders gone wrong, the world is devasted by an outbreak. You and your friend will have to cooperate in order to complete missions. Prepare yourself before every wave, buy weapons, ammos and set up turrets to stay alive. Each wave, the Infecteds are more and more numerous.

name: Elon and the Divine Proof
description: A 3D action platformer. Elon must collect all the Burgers scattered around this mysterious place to open the passage back.

name: Dungeon Gore: Lost Treasury
description: Dungeon Gore is a FPS, strategy, and stealth horror game where you explore the dungeon and collect enough ancient treasure and escape with your findings.

name: Maple Tale
description: Sin descripción

name: Holo Pop
description: Let's liven up the broadcast together with talents and listeners! A Hololive fan game that's easy to enjoy by simply shooting and hitting! Despite its simple gameplay, it's a pinball game that you can enjoy strategically, collecting, and getting deeply involved in

name: Crossing Miracles
description: "Crossing Miracles" is a 3D shooter from northwest China, set in a zombie-ravaged post-apocalyptic world. Drive a unique tricycle through a detailed rural setting and battle relentless zombies in a thrilling survival adventure.

name: Endme
description: An indie game in which one IT guy is about to lose himself. He worked hard but his director canceled all that was done. Be careful! You'll need to shoot, jump and go through the consciousness thorns of our character to the end!

name: Hide and Seek with Noah
description: Where children's games take a captivating turn. A point and click adventure game where you play hide and seek with your friend Noah!

name: Elite Hacker: Retro Hacking Evolution
description: Do you ever lay awake at night thinking about Zero Cool wearing the dress?

name: Paratroopers Raid
description: In this exciting shooting game, highly trained paratroopers are sent off in waves to destroy your base. Evolve your base and weapons with each turn to fight stronger enemies. Control your weapons, adjust your aim, clear the sky of enemies, evolve and have fun.

name: Halfling
description: An open world cozy fantasy rpg. Farm, adventure, smoke pipe weed, and live the life of a Halfling.

name: Abandoned City
description: Welcome to the abandoned city. All that's left in this city are zombies, and maybe they're interested in you. At the moment you are isolated, sure to die, but you have to hold on for as long as you can. Do you happen to know if someone will see your desperate uprising and rescue you..

name: Rocket League: Season 16
description:
Urban Legends Emerge from the Arena’s Darkest Depths.From the menacing Mothman to the chilling Chupacabra, ancient folklore revs to life in Rocket League Season 16!

Legendary monsters have been sighted on the field, but are they real or just an illusion? Turn up those headlamps and shine a light on the myths (and moths) of Rocket League Season 16 starting September 4!
⁠
⁠In Season 16, wade into the worrisome wilderness and compete in an all-new Arena, Drift Woods. And if things get too eerie, take comfort behind the wheel of Rocket League’s latest cars.

name: Bus Driving Simulator: EVO
description: Sin descripción

name: Let's Play! Oink Games - Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Fill The Cup
description: Main challenge lies in maneuvering the water stream around various obstacles that block the direct path to the glass. However, the player doesn't have an infinite supply of water. This means that players must use their resources wisely, ensuring they avoid unnecessary obstacles and carefully plan their water usage to collect all the stars and to make a happy glass full of water.

name: G-Mode Archives+: Story of Seasons Mobile - Life & Love
description: Story of Seasons Mobile - Life & Love has all the core features from the series: farming, ranching, mining, gardening, getting married, and exploring your local village. It was originally available on Docomo phones in Japan before being ported to Steam in September of 2024.

name: No Man's Sky: Aquarius
description:
The Aquarius update to No Man's Sky adds Fishing to the game. Adding to the new water tech introduced in Worlds Update Part 1!

This includes new aquatic creatures to fish for, a new exo craft for players to utilise and various otehr additions including bait!

name: Nobk Overlay
description: Welcome to NOBK Overlay, the ultimate fruit-clicking adventure! Your task is simple: click on delicious, vibrant fruits to generate even more fruits. The more you click, the more your orchard grows, and the juicier your rewards become!

name: Just War Trains
description: Just War Trains is an online shooter where players control heavily armored trains, engaging in intense battles against an opponent. The objective is to outgun the opposing train with precise shooting. You can play with up to 24 people in WAR TRAINS!

name: Fantasy Map Simulator
description: Fantasy Map Simulator: Create and watch imaginary worlds evolve over centuries. Design maps, simulate nations, and control destinies. See empires rise and fall on your desktop wallpaper. A unique simulation for history buffs and creative minds.

name: Super Shaking Girl!!!
description: Shake things up with SUPER SHAKING GIRL!!!, an exhilarating action game that'll have you shaking sodas to propel yourself through the air! Shake, fly, rinse, and repeat... The sky's the limit!

name: Mining Mechs + Magnetic Mystery Bundle
description: This bundle includes the base game Mining Mechs and its Magnetic Mystery add-on!

name: Son and Bone
description: Son and Bone is a fast-paced first-person shooter where you take on the role of Sam Judge, a Sheriff, that after tracking down a notorious bandit who attacked a farm and kidnapped a local, has found himself on an alien world overrun by prehistoric creatures and dinosaurs.

name: Puffin Planes
description: A casual airline management game set on a globe. Supports singleplayer and Steam co-op.

name: Global Elite
description: Save the Earth from countless swarms of giant insects as a valiant member of the GLOBAL ELITE! Auto-battle your way to victory with a ragtag crew of survivors! Use every weapon at your disposal to crush those bugs and save humanity! Join the fight and become a member of the GLOBAL ELITE!

name: Sword vs. Horde
description: A melee based horde survival game. You are a knight wielding an oversized greatsword. Whirl it around in circles and use your blade's momentum to slash through endless hordes of monsters. But take care! You'll get dizzy from all the spinning!

name: Necroking
description: Necroking is a turn-based tactics roguelite with pixel art graphics. You play as a Master of Necromancy. Build your sculls deck, rise skeletons and other scum to defeat settlements desecrated by life.

name: Rocket!
description: Build a stronger ship with each play session as you earn resources needed to upgrade your ship and apply stronger weapons. Customize your ship to your play style and tackle greater and stronger enemies as the levels continue in this endless roguelite.

name: Envelope
description: Envelope is a psychological thriller game that puts you in the shoes of an unfortunate soul who finds himself getting pushed to do something beyond anything he could possibly imagine.

name: 3Xtinction
description: 3Xtinction is an Online Co-op Top Down Shooter with tactical and strategic elements. You and your friends will have to cooperate in order to complete missions.

name: Submarine Terror
description: A sinister entity lurks in the depths. Descend into the abyss and extract knowledge about it.

name: Forest Football
description: Car football game with multiplayer.

name: Gah!
description: Gah! is a minimalist blend of hack 'n' slash and roguelite with low-poly graphics and...a twist.

name: Bunny Battle Nemesis
description: Sci-fi, bloodthirsty bunnies, and the powers of a goddess at your disposal! This is Bunny Battle Nemesis. Experience intense action, explosions, and chaos as you defend the Bunny Kingdom from certain doom at the hands of a vengeful demigod and her army of mercenaries.

name: Age of Mythology: Retold
description: Age of Mythology: Retold is a remastered version of the 2002 real-time strategy classic Age of Mythology. Players manage civilizations inspired by Greek, Norse, and Egyptian mythologies, commanding human armies and legendary monsters while invoking the powers of gods to shape the battlefield. Built on the Age of Empires III: Definitive Edition engine, the remake features overhauled visuals, updated animations, and a symphonic reimagining of the original soundtrack. With modern design enhancements and expanded options, it offers a refreshed experience for both returning fans and new players.

name: Garbanzo Quest
description: Garbanzo Quest! The crazy bullet-heck platformer where your main weapon is your own spit! Help Garbanzo (and Pinto if you have a buddy) save their Friends from the evil Billi' Bones and his wacky world full of hand-crafted challenges, secrets, and branching paths!

name: Northend Tower Defense
description: Live real time battle, micromanagement and survive the battle with your army of your chosen, Live with mayhem and explosions.

name: Don't Stare
description: Don't Stare is a narrative stealth platformer about avoiding extroverts who want to talk to you! You play as the Introvert, trying your best to bring your friendship group back together after a party gone wrong shatters it. Jump, climb, slide, bounce and flip your way through a journey of mental health, setting boundaries, and finding that the overly friendly extroverts aren't actually mean, just different!

name: Cylinder: Puzzles Returned
description: A puzzle game developed by Mighty Rabbit Studios.

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Tropical Taskforce Pack
description: The sun is calling, what are you waiting for? The Tropical Taskforce Pack has the perfect outfits for a tropical summer, ensuring you always look great while riding the wave of justice. The pack contains six different, summerly undercover uniforms.

name: Star Trucker: Amped Customization Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: The Casting of Frank Stone: Deluxe Edition
description: The shadow of Frank Stone looms over Cedar Hills, a town forever altered by his violent past. As a group of young friends are about to discover, Stone's blood-soaked legacy cuts deep, leaving scars across families, generations, and the very fabric of reality itself.

name: Terror Mod Ultraultimatum HD
description: Kill the mysteries that are scattered throughout San Andreas.

name: Bury Me With The Rain
description: Bury me with the rain is an interactive short story about the life, friendship and struggle of Jean and Avery. Follow their journey of hardship, joy and heartfelt conversation as they try to find meaning for their own lives.

name: Real Truck Simulator USA Car Games: Premium Millionaire Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Bush Simulator
description: Welcome to Bush Simulator, the game you never knew you wanted and probably still don't, but hey, it's here! Get ready to experience the ultimate in bush observation—because who needs explosions, zombies, or epic quests when you can just... look at a bush?

name: Trainz 2019: RCH 14T Class A/B Tankers
description: RCH 14T Class A/B Tankers were built between 1939 and 1944, and lasted up till the early 1970s. This pack includes 8 variants of the class A and B tankers in the BR era, each with 3 levels of weathering, and animated couplings, handbrakes and brake gear.

name: Critter Town
description: A short horror story inspired by Animal Crossing for the DS, nostalgia for the 2000s and old creepypasta.

name: Spirit Valor
description: In Spirit Valor, you play as a spirit caught in a struggle between magic and fate. After a magic outburst binds him to a human warrior Richard's body, the two embark on a perilous quest to stop the rise of demonic forces. With the world’s laws shattered, and the Overlord vanished, they must track down this elusive enemy before it is too late. Armed with the powerful Spellstones and magic, the spirit warrior sets out on an epic journey to restore balance to the world and prevent the transformation into a demon.

name: Night Doner
description: You have just started the night shift in a doner shop. At first everything seems ordinary and quiet, but you soon realize that this is no ordinary night.

name: Harry Potter: Quidditch Champions - Deluxe Edition
description: Your next chapter takes flight! Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of Quidditch by playing solo or sharing the magic with friends and family.

name: 2.5 Dimensional Seduction: Angels on Stage!
description: Enjoy The Turn Based RPG like Gameplay and Strike a Pose in cosplay as Ririsa wants to show the world her love for her favorite character Liliel in this awesome storybased game!

name: Minecraft: Fantastic Fairgrounds
description: Discover how to and unlock the power of AI through a wondrous world! Practice the skills to understand, evaluate, and utilize this exciting technology. Shape the future with AI literacy!

name: Pokémon Go: Max Out
description: The 16th implementation of seasons intersected with the Autumn season in Northern Hemisphere and Spring season in the Southern Hemisphere. This season's theme is focused around the Dynamax feature and the Pokémon of Galar.

name: Persephone
description: Persephone is a dream-inspired, unique approach to first-person survival horror. With no weapons to attack, you'll need to utilize your environment in order to survive. When your surroundings won't save you in some scenarios, the only option is to run and redirect the threat.

name: Agents of Spleef
description: A crazy, single- or multi-player spleef game. Die the least amount of times to win.

name: Harry Potter Quidditch Champions: Firebolt Supreme Broom Skin
description: Sin descripción

name: Art for Snakes
description:
ART for Snakes is a single player snake-ish game by Splerp, Cheeseness, and lcl. Be a snake, eat the most expensive paintings you can before the time limit runs out.
"Our gallery provides snake-friendly access to all floors. Please do not climb on or touch the exhibits (unless nobody is watching)."
Use snake-like controls to move through and leap from painting to painting across a branching 4 course campaign.
ART for Snakes is intended to become challenging as it progresses, but for players who'd prefer a more relaxed experience, there is a "zen mode" available that removes time constraints.

name: Space CleanUp: Cosmic Robot Disinfector
description: Fight cosmic grime with your trusty robot disinfector!

name: Fallout 76: Milepost Zero
description: Sin descripción

name: Spectre Divide
description: Spectre Divide is the genre-evolving, competitive 3v3 tactical shooter driven by Duality. Use Duality to control two bodies in real-time, letting you defend two sites at once, cover your own cross, or even trade yourself. Master tactical gunplay and an arsenal of future tech to achieve infamy.

name: Stars Commander
description: This is a game set in space and focused on trade of resources between spaceships and space stations.

name: Dinos
description: Hatch eggs, collect dinosaurs, and trade them with friends! Get free eggs every few hours or trade your extra dinosaurs for more eggs!

name: Spaceman
description: Conquer the heights of space by navigating treacherous landscapes. Battle gravity and test your skill to reach the top. Get ready for the climb of your life.

name: Fruits & Vegetables
description: Fruits & Vegetables is a clicker game. You can merge fruits and vegetables to get new ones!

name: We Heist Too
description: Welcome to the city of Rywadorium! Explore the unique regions of the city and pretend you're a regular citizen with no illegal intentions. Enter people's homes without permission and immerse yourself into a role of a thief in a unique setting of atomic 1960s fiction, at this regular day at 'work'.

name: Tragala
description: Tragala is a graphic adventure game in which you will play Kurt, a restless young man who tries to escape from the system house ruled by the junjuma, a control and blame machine that is part of a systematic and terrible monster known as Tragala.

name: Penguin Helper
description: Penguin Helper is your chance to go to the South Pole, become a hero for penguins and enjoy a peaceful atmosphere

name: Galandrix
description: Galandrix is an arcade game played from a top-down view and features both fast-paced action and real time strategic choices. Select your ship and blast off into the unknown against countless hordes of enemies.

name: PromptCrafter
description: The game is a command-line based crafting game with procedurally generated crafting trees. The crafting can be automated using programming-like automation.

name: Reshape
description: You're the architect of your world. Design without limits, create without boundaries. Your world, your way, unleash your creativity.

name: Descensus
description: Descensus is a souls-like action-RPG with challenging combat set in post-catastrophe diesel punk world. The player's goal is to reach the heart of the mysterious Rift of the Fallen Star. It is necessary to stop the expansion and spread of the anomaly before it absorbs the whole world.

name: My Corp Cargo Simulator
description: In this game, we manage a cargo company in a small town. We can deliver cargo to customers within the city by walking, cycling, motorcycle or car. In this business start-up simulation game, you must make serious decisions and work hard to grow your cargo company.

name: The Moon 2044
description: Explore a secret NCIS facility and discover its dark secret. Take on the role of the XV-11 unit and face hundreds of enemies in a dark sci-fi shooter inspired by old school hits!

name: The Casting of Frank Stone
description: The shadow of Frank Stone looms over Cedar Hills, a town forever altered by his violent past. As a group of young friends are about to discover, Stone’s blood-soaked legacy cuts deep, leaving scars across families, generations, and the very fabric of reality itself.

name: Flambeau: Deluxxx Edition
description: The mansion is filled to the brim with treaters wanting a sweet reward...it's your job to make sure they spend the rest of their afterlife enjoying the sweet nectar of Flambeau's body.

name: Gym Nights
description: You are the caretaker of an old abandoned gym. Working as a watchman has long been an important part of your life. But what does this place hide? Why do you end up here again and again?

name: Back to the Fooker: Zombie Fooker 2
description: No persons under the age of 18 permitted.Join Doug Fooker, Nunya Bidness, and Kim Aginavi as they try to cure the zombie virus by going back in time to find a pure form of the virus.

name: The Hidden Art of Innkeeping
description: Transform an old farmhouse in a seaside village into a luxurious inn! Meet interesting guests, discover new areas and hidden treasures, configure rooms and amenities, complete mini-quests, uncover secrets, and rejuvenate the struggling village in this simulation-adventure game!

name: Star Trucker
description: Haul cargo, trade salvage and keep your space suit close as you search for fame and fortune among the stars in a game that puts an interstellar twist on the truck sim genre.

name: Harry Potter: Quidditch Champions
description: Your next chapter takes flight! Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of Quidditch by playing solo or sharing the magic with friends and family.

name: Farmer Against Potatoes Idle
description: Pick up your sword and fight off waves of Potatoes by upgrading your stats constantly, use Equipment, choose between different Classes, put your many Talents to good use, and so much more designed to keep you entertained for a long time.

name: Robot Rumble 2
description: Build your robot. Battle your robot. Robot Rumble 2 is a robot combat game where you create your robot from real-world parts, then drive it in the arena to defeat other robots.

name: Kana Seito Defense
description: Improve your Japanese learning with Kana Seito Defense, a typing defense game to learn the writing systems of Hiragana and Katakana, and to build proficiency in Kanji through extensive practice!

name: Portal: Lost in Aperture
description: This is a mod for Portal 1. Includes new maps, storyline, a whole new Portal experience. This game take place in an Aperture laboratory in Eastern-Europe.

name: Anipang Matchlike
description: Sin descripción

name: Muhaboy
description: Step into the shoes of Muhaboy! Dash and smash muha-s in this wild tactical beat 'em up, saving humanity from the looming Second Muha War! Battle it out with limited resources and adapt to the ever-changing chaos. Buzzopolis is waiting for its hero—time to show those muha-s who’s boss!

name: War Thunder: Ancient Helicopter Snail Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Advance: Most Mods
description: The MOST Mods are a collection of mods of the Sonic Advance's Android port that gives quality of life improvements to the game. These mods feature brand-new modifications and improvements alongside the previous ones from the Anniversary Mods Pack released back in 2021.

name: Hentai Stars: Ultra Deluxe
description: Sin descripción

name: Friday Night Funkin': Yellow
description:
FNF: Yellow is a love letter to the hit fangame: Undertale Yellow!

In this mod you will sing with many familiar faces from UTY, as well as some extra guests from various parts of the UT/DR fandom.

name: Hentai Golf: Happy Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: FlipBook
description: Unleash your creativity with Flipbook to create your own, unique stories.

name: Roguecraft
description: Sin descripción

name: Digital Tamers 2
description:
Tamers from all around the world, it's time to digitize once again!!
The long-awaited sequel to the acclaimed casual fighting fan game "Digital Tamers: ReBorn" is finally here!

Raise, battle, and evolve!
Embark on the Digital World and find new friends, adventures, and surprises! With more than 100 challenges, 50 unique quests, and more than 380 different Digimon to collect, the Digital World is yours to explore as you wish!

name: Constriction: 1024
description: Based both on Congestion 1024 and Claustrophobia 1024, all the maps have a playable area of 1024x1024 Doom map units or less using OTEX. You can't escape the boundaries of the maps, but your enemies can.

name: D3ad Hand
description:
Crack the code, feed the cat, save the world.
Yuri Spraytyvich has been selected for the role of Junior Strategic Missile Force Manager of Čerëmuški Command Post in Chita, Siberia.
His new position comes with a lot of responsabilities and he will need to deal with lack of maintenance, worker strikes, radioactive materials and PERIMETER, the soviet automatic defence system.
When PERIMETER receives by mistake the order to start the launch of the ballistic missile, it is up to Yuri to fix the problem and save the world from nuclear apocalypse.
D3AD HAND is a satirical Point and click comedy adventure game set during the cold war in a soviet bunker.

name: Words Guesser
description:
Words Guesser is an engaging word puzzle game that brings the thrill of collaborative gameplay directly to your Twitch stream. In this game, you and your viewers work together to uncover hidden words from a jumbled board of letters displayed on your screen. With each round, you'll need to find as many words as possible, relying on your community’s quick thinking and sharp eyes.

Each level presents a unique board of scrambled letters, challenging you to discover a majority of the hidden words to advance. The game progressively increases in difficulty by introducing trick letters and mystery letters that only reveal themselves after a certain time or when a player successfully guesses them.

name: Cast Cats
description: Welcome to the exciting world of cute cartoon cats! Get ready for an exciting adventure in the 'Find the Differences' genre, where 42 levels of exciting challenges await you.

name: WaggaSim
description: Take to the skies in the ultimate paragliding and speed-flying simulator. Experience lifelike physics, design or modify your own gear, and perfect your style: soaring, thermaling, acro, freestyle, and more. With soft-body wings that move like real fabric, the sky is no longer the limit!

name: Simulator of Ukraine 1991: The Great Sea
description: This DLC deletes Russia and turns it into an ocean.

name: Let Them Breathe: Selena's Awakening
description: Selena awakes in a dark and hot room where fire burns in stone ovens. She is told by her "roommate" she needs to find the key to unlock the door. Unlucky for Selena, she has to find many keys to unlock many doors all the while enemies lurk in the shadows.

name: Three Alpha One Nine
description: A modern approach to platformers and adventure where speed, precision, and curiosity are not only required, but rewarded. As robot 3A19, jump, run, and boost your way through a wide range of locations throughout time and space.

name: Through the Galaxy
description: Immerse yourself in an unknown galaxy. Collect resources, upgrade your spaceship and experience an exciting mix of action and adventure with intense battles in a calm atmosphere. Discover new worlds and master challenges on your epic journey through space.

name: Oath
description: A short story companion to vai5000's EP, oath

name: Virtual Fight World
description: A 3d multiplayer party game where you can run around with friends, change your outfit or skin tone; fight, swim, do fun activities like dancing, going on a waterslide or performing in a strip club. Plus perform dozens of fight moves!

name: Pig Rush
description: "Pig Rush" is a maze adventure game set in a deep forest. In this game, you guide a brave little wild boar named Argan. Argan will evade traps, defeat enemies, and keep moving forward to find the answers needed to save his tribe.

name: Grand Fantasia: Origin
description: New engine, New gameplay, New adventure, the classic MMORPG 《Grand Fantasia：ORIGIN》technological innovation, reigniting the heart of adventure, and composing a new chapter of the fantasy World with Sprites.

name: Junkyard Killbots
description: Junkyard Killbots is a rogue lite auto battler where where you build robots, equip killer items, and smash your enemies. Manage your robot army by combining items to upgrade their power or spreading them out between your bots. Scavenge new items, find new blueprints, and discover new combos!

name: Oopz-Oofs
description: A quirky, playful dog sim where you body-swap with a dog. Waking up from a sweet dream, John finds himself in his dog's body! Sniff, bark, beg, and use paw to interact with the townfolks. Can John find a way to return to his human form, or will this unexpected adventure change them forever?

name: Izgub 2001
description: You decide how a civil war in the country of Izgub is supposed to end. Visual novel with strong themes of war, political violence and moral dilemma.

name: Moanera
description: MOANera is a clicker game, where you click on characters that make unique sounds! Receive unique items every few hours, build your collection and craft rarer items! All characters and items have been added to the game for a limited period of time, and will change over time.

name: Match Kill Survive
description: An intense blend of match-3 puzzle action and combat in Match Kill Survive. Your mission: survive relentless waves of zombies by matching tiles to generate ammunition for your squad. Each color you match powers up a specific squad member, allowing them to unleash devastating attacks on the undead.

name: Sumerian Six
description: Lead an unlikely team of commando scientists behind enemy lines to fight Nazis, uncover arcane mysteries, and wield experimental technology to turn the tide of WWII in this real-time tactical stealth adventure.

name: Ninja 1987
description: Ninja 1987 is a dive back into the past with the most authentic 8-bit side-scrolling action-platformer. Use shinobi skills to thwart a nefarious threat and rediscover all the adrenaline of timeless classics!

name: Clutch-Master
description: This is a 2D top-down shooter with a flair of parody. You need to clutch 16 rounds in a row to win the map. There are 10 different maps in the base game.

name: Medieval Chaos
description: Survive in this Medieval world for as long as you can, evolve your weapons and collect different skins!

name: Deepest World
description: DeepestWorld is a coding sandbox MMORPG where you can automate your character with JavaScript. Explore an endless open world. Hunt rare monsters and bosses. Craft deep builds and items. Acquire programming skills. Grind 24/7.

name: Deathtrip
description: Ayla's Deathtrip is a daring, stylish, high-octane FPS catered to the speedfreaks, mid-2000s weirdcore enthusiasts, hypercore fanatics and adrenaline junkies. Rack up style points as you strafe and bunnyhop through a demonic near-death experience.

name: Wizard Realm
description: Wizard Realm is a dynamic game with rogue-like elements set in a fantastic 3D world. It enables players to develop various battle strategies using a multitude of magical skills to survive. It enriched with an advanced item system.

name: Orb Of The Watcher
description: A tribute to the old adventure games of the nineties. Orb Of The Watcher is party based RPG where you explore the tunnels under a large city to find a magical artifact. Encountering friends, enemies and the odd pile of gold along the way.

name: Security Control
description: Security Control is a 1-4 player co-op and PVP escape room game. You have fallen asleep on your first day of work and now have to evade the security officer to escape or get caught and fired. Hide, run, complete objectives, steal money and escape before you get fired!

name: Take A Leak
description: Human testing is back in fashion! Solve the puzzles laid out by Toilet Labs in this piss-filled experience. Our state of the art latrine testing facilities ensure you will feel more relief on solving a puzzle than ever before.

name: Warrior Next
description: Few against many... Fight with a handful of Spartans to save Greece. Destroy hordes of enemies until the fight with creatures sent by the Gods. Lots of action for everyone!

name: Area93
description: A journey through Area 93, where a zombie apocalypse occurred.

name: Together in Between
description: Together in Between is a first-person adventure-puzzle game. You have been imprisoned in a magic book with your partner, in the same place but in different dimensions. Will you be able to overcome the Wizard King's puzzles, and see your partner again?

name: HolyHunt
description:
HolyHunt is a roguelike shooter game that unites the nostalgic and fun 8-bit aesthetic with modern and complex shooting mechanics.

Make your way into the church hall to shoot and dash through different species of demons and bosses with unique mechanics that keep challenging your abilities each run.

Buy improvements and different bullets suited to your enemy's weakness and receive blessings from angels as you keep fighting to get even stronger. Trust in your faith and keep shooting to save the world from the doomsday prophecy.

name: SuperOffice
description: SuperOffice is an intense top down view shooter experience where time moves only when you move.

name: Starcom: Unknown Space
description: Starcom: Unknown Space is an action RPG of space exploration and adventure. Build your own starship while discovering an epic story in a universe of strange mysteries, alien factions and uncharted worlds.

name: Battle Gem Ponies
description:
A super-powered, shapeshifting pony RPG.

Command a super-powered, shape-shifting pony in this RPG Adventure! In a world where unpredictable legendary beasts pose an existential threat, you'll embark on a journey across the Pinto region to become the best pony tamer in the world and protect your magical companion from those who want to use her as a secret weapon.

Customize your team with hundreds of different moves, stat arrangements, & collectible battle gear to gain the upper hand in this rapid-switchout Rock/Paper/Scissors combat system.

A years-in-the-making love letter to the My Little Pony & Pokémon communities, celebrating one year of progress since the successful Kickstarter campaign!

name: Qanga
description: QANGA is a science fiction game about exploration and survival in the solar system. Synchronize your consciousness in a cyborg provided from ICLab's Industry labs and explore this universe!

name: Qanga
description: Qanga is a science fiction game about exploration and survival in the solar system. Synchronize your consciousness in a cyborg provided from ICLab's Industry labs and explore this universe!

name: Football Bros
description: The latest in our line of Bros games, Football Bros has really taken off and we couldn’t be more proud! We’ve even added a new Franchise mode so you can take your team on the road across America and lead them to victory!

name: Imprimatura
description:
Imagine that you are an artist. Imagine that you are in mourning. A painter – your relative, and your former mentor – has died. In their will, they have left you seven paintings of your choosing from their collection. But which seven? What matters to you as both an artist and an inheritor of your mentor’s legacy? And what memories will these paintings stir up?
Imprimatura is a nonlinear work of interactive fiction that makes light use of procedural generation and heavy use of a multilayered painting that changes based on your choices.

name: Black Death Interactive
description: Travel back to 14th century Venice during history's deadliest pandemic. This interactive historical narrative puts you in the shoes of Giana, a young baker's daughter, as you face impossible choices in a city gripped by plague.

name: You Can't Save Her

You have three seconds to kill your former friend.

The nuns and sacred algorithms have willed it.

And no matter how much you want to save her, you can’t.

Explore the research facility that you live in and find those missing critters before the morning shift starts, or your Master gets in trouble.

All of Us is the umbrella title for a pair of complementary books in the All of Us series.

Uniquely, the two books in the All of Us series released simultaneously with parallel and overlapping storylines. These are All of Us: Her Story, which features a female main character with a female love interest, and All of Us: His Story, which features a male main character with a male love interest.

It features a wide variety of handcrafted and highly-detailed locations with meticulous pixel art and a soundtrack consisting of over 70 pieces, many of which feature live musicians.

name: The Doinksoft Collection
description:
The Doinksoft collection bundles three action-packed games on a single cartridge, and all of them are a good fit for the Switch's mobile-centric design.

First up is Gato Roboto. You're a cute cat piloting a cozy armored mech in this game, a metroidvania with stylish monochromatic visuals. As you trek through an alien underworld full of irritable creatures and treacherous obstacles, you'll get closer to rescuing your stranded captain and salvaging his crashed spaceship. You'll need to blast and dash through dangerous terrain, as well as venture outside the mech and risk all nine lives to access areas and uncover cool secrets.

Gunbrella will see you engage in side-scrolling action as you use the lethal rain-deflecting tool to glide, swing, dash, and shoot your way through people who are out for your head. A gritty noir-punk action-adventure game with heaps of fun platforming, you'll also interrogate bizarre characters on your quest for answers in this thrilling game.

Finally, Demon Throttle tells the story of a beautiful vampiress and dusty gunslinger on a quest for vengeance. A demon has been up to no good and has wronged both of the unlikely partners, and revenge calls for a violent assault on that fiend's domain. Interestingly, Demon Throttle was only available as a physical Switch game, so this is a fresh chance to play Demon Throttle and experience its arcade action in case you missed its limited release the first time around.

Welcome to the Final Days of James Whitaker's Library...

description: My Bath Tub Companion is a free experience, to induce a calm & peaceful (and mildly horny) feeling. You'll feel satisfied sitting back, feel yourself relax as you watch her relax. Relaxation is the key to a blissful bath tub experience. Calm music & a beautiful girl to look at.

name: Kira Kano
description: Kira Kano is an upcoming visual novel developed by AZARASHI SOFTWARE in collaboration with Lump of Sugar to commemorate the latter's 10th anniversary that tells the story of Yuzuru, an ordinary student at first glance but he's actually famous on the Internet. His secret identity leaks to a classmate and she... asks to make her his apprentice.

name: World Heritage VR: Swedish Farmhouse
description: Virtual World Heritage: Fågelsjö is a VR rendition of the Fågelsjö farmsteads from the 1700s, located in the Hälsningland area of Sweden.

name: Echo in Capistrano
description: Echo in Capistrano is an atmospheric horror game with a simple goal - rescue the survivors, escape, and most importantly survive. Use your unique echo ability to find a path through the dizzying cave system of Capistrano, but be careful, there are things that lie in wait and they are hungry...

name: Stardrop
description: Gumdrop was peacefully sleeping in their asteroid when a mysterious force smashed it to pieces above the orbit of a nearby planet. Venture through a whimsical world to collect all the lost star droplets, slivers, and shards in this 3D platformer collectathon.

name: Pineford: Part I
description: Investigate the murder of Evie Roots. Save the town from disaster. Learn the history of the Great Houses. Immerse yourself in the centuries-old history of Pineford.

name: Hyakusen no Jou ni Kawatareshi Toki
description: Hyakusen no Jou ni Kawataresi Toki is a Japanese RPG, released by Eushry on PC in 2024.

name: Star Chef Simulator
description:
Welcome to Star Chef Simulator, where your dream of running your own restaurant is about to become a reality! Immerse yourself in the exciting world of culinary entrepreneurship as you build and manage your restaurant from the ground up. Unleash your inner chef and dive in the art of cooking with more than 10 delicious dishes from around the world. Cook with a variety of different ingredients, techniques and recipes to create culinary masterpieces that will delight your customers. Use various kitchen appliances such as the deep fryer, oven, stove or mixer and create unique dishes!

Hire, train, and manage your employees to keep your restaurant running smoothly. Build a strong team to handle the hustle and bustle of a busy kitchen. Customize your restaurant, from the walls to the floors, from the decor to the equipment. Create a unique dining experience and watch customers flock to your establishment.
Keep an eye on your finances as you make decisions to grow your business. Manage employee costs and invest in upgrades to attract more customers and increase profits. Provide top-notch service to your guests to earn rave reviews. Listen to feedback and strive to deliver a memorable dining experience that keeps guests coming back for more.

Are you ready to take the helm of your own restaurant and become the ultimate culinary star chef? The world of gastronomy awaits you!

name: Star Wars Outlaws: Special Edition
description:
Experience the first-ever open world Star Wars game, set between the events of The Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi. Explore distinct planets across the galaxy, both iconic and new. Risk it all as Kay Vess, an emerging scoundrel seeking freedom and the means to start a new life, along with her companion Nix. Fight, steal, and outwit your way through the galaxy’s crime syndicates as you join the galaxy’s most wanted.

The Special Edition includes the base game and the Sabacc Shark Character Pack.

name: Nolgorb's Ordeal
description: A challenging 3D platformer with little room for error. Escape a dungeon by jumping to the top, and trade your collectables to aid in your ordeal.

name: Pharmacy Simulator
description: Experience a realistic pharmacy management experience with Pharmacy Simulator. Set up your shop, decorate it as you wish, and purchase over a hundred types of medications. Pharmacy Simulator offers you an incredibly realistic pharmacy experience. Prove your skills in a challenging economic system.

name: Star Wars Outlaws: Limited Edition
description:
Experience the first-ever open world Star Wars game, set between the events of The Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi. Explore distinct planets across the galaxy, both iconic and new. Risk it all as Kay Vess, an emerging scoundrel seeking freedom and the means to start a new life, along with her companion Nix. Fight, steal, and outwit your way through the galaxy’s crime syndicates as you join the galaxy’s most wanted.

The Limited Edition includes the base game and the Rogue Infiltrator Character Pack.

name: Dale & Dawson Stationery Supplies
description: Navigate office intrigue in Dale & Dawson Stationery Supplies! Complete tasks, uncover the carrier of illegal leads, and outsmart coworkers in this strategic multiplayer game set in an early 2000s office.

name: Cozy Designer
description: Position furniture and objects however you prefer and create 60 incredibly cozy environments. With no right or wrong, the only limit is your imagination! Create your own gallery and share your designs with the whole world.

name: Warcat Parade
description: Catboy in a bullet hell! Nyan, nyan, pew pew pew!

name: Defense of the Earth
description: Gather a task force of the best fighters earth has to offer and research technology to defend against the invaders out of space. You have to lead your squad through various grid- and turn-based battles. Between missions, you plan your next moves, manage your crew's abilities and relationships.

name: Tribute
description: In "Tribute," a fast-paced roguelike, escape prison and save your son by harvesting souls for power, unlocking abilities, and facing numerous foes. Discover 15 endings shaped by your choices, with extensive upgrades and classes enhancing your journey.

name: Fumble Fiesta
description: Fumble Fiesta is a whimsical multiplayer party game designed for up to 4 players. Navigate through a series of colorful obstacle courses, filled with wacky challenges and unexpected twists. Compete against friends or random opponents as you race, jump, and tumble your way to victory.

name: DeliSpace
description: Deliver packages... in space! Test your agility by navigating through different galaxies carrying diverse packages and upgrade your ship. Will you become the best courier in the universe?

name: Hidden Dino Cats: Bonus Level
description: Hidden Dino Cats - Bonus Level includes one additional hand-drawn level with 100 more cats to find! ️‍

name: Dino Cats
description: 🦕 Hidden Dino Cats - Find and paint 100 hidden cats in this dinosaur park! Test your attention and relax in this cozy and free game ️‍♂️

name: Grim
description: Grim is a horror game inspired from Taiwanese folklore “Aunt Tiger”. The player will play in a room-oriented 3rd-person perspective as a “ghost” and will observe the world from fixed camera perspectives to solve puzzles and survive the monster’s pursuit.

name: Backrooms: Last Room
description: Experience the unknown world of utility rooms through a VHS camera, you will have to feel all the fear and anxiety of loneliness, plunging deeper and deeper into the world of utility rooms behind the scenes In search of that very, cherished, last room

name: Yarimono
description: The protagonist's life takes a turn after their partner Yarimon learns the ultra-invincible 'cheat Tackle' Constantly challenging various trainers to participate in the Yarimon tournament, the protagonist unexpectedly discovers the secrets of this world in the process.

name: Megaloot
description: Minimalistic Rogue-Lite RPG with big focus on itemization where you craft your own playstyle inside the endless tower.

name: Kerker
description: Kerker is a procedurally generated dungeon crawler FPS roguelike that challenges the player with its varying cast of enemies, exclusive weapons and different dungeon types. Fight your way to riches by slaying foes, obtaining/combining unique abilities and finding forgotten treasures.

name: Jump Queen
description: Get to the top in the really challenging platformer Jump Queen! You don't need a hot girl, she's already here. You just need to move up because the fall price is too high. Jump, collect coins, look for secrets and get to the top.

name: Cute Fames Adventure
description: Cute Fames Adventure is an RPG game, more or less, where you play as this little creature that is called Fame, Fame is a normal looking humanoid creature that was turned into a dog by an experiment that only happened in their town. It is now your time to find out who did it and get him back to what he looked like!

name: Date Z
description: "Date Z" - a captivating mix of high school drama, romance, and mystery. As a transfer student, your challenge is to navigate relationships and secure a date by Friday to survive a deadly virus outbreak. Unravel the hidden secrets. Every choice you make counts.

name: Umamusume: Pretty Derby - Party Dash
description: Give heed! Our academy's time-honored Spring Fan Fest will play to a very special event! Behold, the Slapdash Grand Prix! Teams will compete in four exhilarating events! Aim for ultimate glory in Hurtling Hurdles, Blazing Baskets, Dodgeball Demolitions, and Gourmet Gauntlet!

name: Star Wars Outlaws
description: Experience the first-ever open world Star Wars game, set between the events of The Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi. Explore distinct planets across the galaxy, both iconic and new. Risk it all as Kay Vess, an emerging scoundrel seeking freedom and the means to start a new life, along with her companion Nix. Fight, steal, and outwit your way through the galaxy’s crime syndicates as you join the galaxy’s most wanted.

name: Angola '86
description: The first strategy game to capture the essence of the entire South African Border war, from Omugulugwombashe to UNTAG (Aug'66 - Mar'90)

name: Skystrider
description: Embark on an epic journey in "Skystrider," a 3D action platformer. As a resurrected hero, explore a ruined world, navigating perilous paths amidst clouds and tides. Unleash ancient technology, unravel secrets, and shape your destiny in this captivating adventure.

name: Kamikaze Lassplanes
description: Fly and fall for powerful Lassplanes! Discover a hand-crafted anime VN with story-driven arcade shoot-'em-up gameplay. Take part in a romantic story with drama and comedic elements set in a steampunk Kingdom filled with magic and torn by a brutal war. Decide the fate of your country and heart.

name: Gems Defenders
description: Match 3 Game, Tower Defense Game and Story driven RPG. Gems Defenders have it all! Match enchanted gems to power up your town, heal your heroes, charge powerful spells, defeat the enemies that are storming the gates of your city and uncover lore of the mysterious Aldenor!

name: Super Dungeon Designer
description: Build you own dungeons and share them with others! Link objects together to trigger events. Create challenging puzzles or daunting challenges with the intuitive Build Mode and Linking system in Super Dungeon Designer!

name: Overtime Pay
description: As the clock strikes midnight, you find yourself trapped within the oppressive confines of a desolate office. Your task seems straightforward: Keep putting the correct paper in the correct place and you might find yourself entitled to overtime pay. And will you?

name: Lily
description: Step into the story of a young girl tormented by her past. Discover dark mysteries and solve complicated riddles on a scary school campus. The unsettling atmosphere, important clues, and Lily's broken recollections await you. Can you help her find comfort in darkness?

name: Not For Broadcast: Complete Edition
description: Enjoy the full Not For Broadcast experience, base game and all DLCs included!

name: Visions of Mana: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Explore a world of elemental spirits and adventure in the latest Mana action-RPG.

name: Go Hell Go: Tsukiotoshiteko - Limited Edition
description:
Box contents:
• Game "goHELLgo: Tsukiotoshiteko"
• Artbook
• Original Soundtrack
• Shop Entrance Curtain
• Systems Voice Collection
• Chest Strap
• Floor Lamp-style Memo Stand
• Lycee OVERTURE Promotional Card

name: Gundam Breaker 4: Diorama Pack Set
description: Sin descripción

name: Running Through Backrooms
description: Welcome to Running Through Backrooms, an immersive horror experience that plunges you into the eerie and unsettling world of the Backrooms. Navigate through seemingly endless hallways and abandoned rooms. Each level presents a unique challenge, combining the thrill of parkour with the terror of the unknown.

name: Super Alien Sniper: Super Realisitic Simulator
description: A SUPER REALISTIC (ahem..) alien sniper simulator! Use your super quick reaction skills to outwit the alien blighters and snipe your way to victory!

name: Wolf Simulator: Silent Paws
description: Survive in a wild world as nature's strongest hunter with Wolf Simulator: Silent Paws! Explore, survive and write your own legend! Join this epic adventure now and become the true hero of the forest.

name: Bunnies Huddled Together
description: An interesting jigsaw puzzle game with irregular pieces featuring beautiful rabbit illustrations. Come and relax with this game!

name: CarX Street PC
description: Conquer mountain roads, highways, and city streets. Build your dream car with detailed tuning that unleashes the potential of “CarX Technology” physics. Take part in thrilling races, enjoying realistic gameplay and dynamic driving.

name: Escape The Garage
description: Wake up at an abandoned train station and find yourself in a dark garage. Solve puzzles, find clues, and uncover secrets to escape. With a suspenseful atmosphere and three different endings, this game will captivate you. Can you escape the nightmare?

name: Find the Cat
description:
Welcome to "Find The Cat", a fun hidden object puzzle game where your mission is to find cats hidden in black and white backgrounds. Simply tap on the cats to reach your goal and advance to the next level.

As you progress through the levels, you'll discover new and exciting places around the world. Each level brings a fresh challenge, keeping the gameplay engaging and enjoyable. There's also a daily mode where you can search for more hidden cats in vibrant, colorful backgrounds.

New levels, scenes, and challenges are added regularly, ensuring that there is always something new to explore. You'll need sharp eyes and quick reflexes to find cats in the most unexpected places. "Find The Cat" is designed for all ages, offering endless fun and adventure for everyone.

Download "Find The Cat" now and start your cat-finding journey. Can you find all the hidden cats?

name: Horror Office
description: Sin descripción

name: Sphere vs. Gravity
description:
Sphere vs Gravity is a physics-based puzzle platformer that challenges your reflexes skills where you navigate through dynamic, gravity-defying environments.

Be prepared—this game is hard and requires time to adapt.

name: Kai-Ri-Sei Million Arthur: Ring
description: Million Arthur Ring is the latest sequel in the Million King Arthur series, bringing back the familiar four-Arthurs gameplay and four-player co-op mode. The game retains the classic card battle mechanics, including attribute weaknesses and card chain buffs, while introducing new strategic elements through CCG-style turn-based gameplay. Players can collect and customize various cards to build their ideal team.
3D Minesweeper 3D Logic. Randomly Generated. Unique Mechanics. Built-in Hints. Detection Assistance.

description: Sin descripción

name: Pinball FX: Goat Simulator Pinball
description: Get ready to experience the wildest pin-baaa-ll game, inspired by the absurdity of Goat Simulator 3! From headbutting bumpers to launching yourself through loops, every move you make will leave a trail of chaos behind.

description: Sin descripción

- A new shiny gold tented paint job for F.R.A.N.K

description:
Thank you for supporting Gori! Please enjoy this free Skin Pack for Gori: Cuddly Carnage that adds :
