name: Gori: Cuddly Carnage - Neon Neko Triple Skin Pack
description:
Get three new dazzling outfits to slay the Adorable Army with Neon Neko Deluxe Skin Pack for Gori: Cuddly Carnage:

The Oni Pack - For when you want to be a demonically sharp dressed cat
The Kawaii Pack - For when you feel cute and might delete the Adorable Army, FROM EXISTENCE
The Arcane Pack - For when you channel the brightest ancient elements into your fury!

Each of the 3 packs contains :

- A slick new outfit For Gori
- A new paint job for F.R.A.N.K
- New effects for Gori’s shield.

Download today and slay the Adorable Army in style!

name: Fuu3: Minus3’s Lab
description: Fuu3: Minus3’s Lab is a point-and-click game being created on the Clickteam Fusion 2.5 engine. Discover what you thought you knew about the titular Minus3, Fuu3’s sworn rival! Meet some extravagant characters, take systems down, and piece together who you were meant to be in this 2000s Newgrounds-inspired take on origin stories!

name: What's done is Done
description: A narrative-driven puzzle game about souls and forgetting. On the brink of reincarnation, she loses all her memories, and her soul is scattered. The memories of lingering spirits on the bridge seem to be connected to her story...

name: Drift Master Simulator
description: Prepare to dominate the drift scene in Drift Master Simulator! Embark on your journey as a street drifter, where you'll begin by selecting your first car from iconic options in the USA, Japan, or Germany. With hard work, dedication, and skillful drifting, ascend through the ranks to claim your place as a top drifter. Feel the adrenaline as you master the art of controlled slides and perfect your technique on challenging tracks.

name: Pilot Flight Simulation
description: Sin descripción

name: Gori: Cuddly Carnage - Special Edition
description:
The Gori : Cuddly Carnage Special Edition contains :

- The full game of Gori : Cuddly Carnage
- The Neon Neko Triple Skin Pack
- The Dragon Skin Pack
- The Day One Skin Pack

name: Hentai Academy: Ultimate Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Sugoi Girls: Sassy Heroine
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Ninja Girls: Kunoichi Puzzle
description:
Cute ninja girls are here!
An easy puzzle game anyone can play

name: Arcade Archives: Finalizer Super Transformation
description:
"FINALIZER SUPER TRANSFORMATION" is a shooter released by KONAMI in 1985
The objective is to operate the variable armor combat system "FINALIZER" and save humanity from the out-of-control "Odes-30i".
Fight while powering up by making full use of the shields, various weapons, and parts that appear during the stage.

name: Wer weiß denn sowas?: Das 3. Spiel
description: Sin descripción

name: Moon Finder
description: Sin descripción

name: The Weight of Life: An Interactive Death Game of Judgement
description: Invited to take part in a shady competition known as the Judge's Game, partners Lana and Percy must work together to survive. Alongside ten other participants, they must navigate three deadly weeks of alliances, betrayals, and drama - each bookended by a fatal judgement; Someone must be chosen as the least valuable and face execution. You assume the role of either Lana or Percy in this interactive visual novel, and who lives and who dies rests entirely in your judgement.

name: Plants Huddled Together
description: An interesting irregular puzzle game featuring beautiful plant illustrations. Come and relax with this game!

name: Pixel Boy 2: The Castle Revenge
description:
Pixel Boy 2 is a continuation of the logic game, where you will find 96 completely new and difficult levels. The goal of the game is still the same. Move the red box to the goal field. This time it won't be so easy.

Creative thinking and problem solving is more than necessary to solve all levels. But do not worry! If you get stuck, you can always use the golden crown to skip a level.

Enjoy the new levels with new graphics and try to finish them all successfully without losing your crowns.

name: Dice Make 10!
description:
New type puzzle uses dice and make 10.
Two modes of puzzles, “Inserting Puzzle” and “Falling Block Puzzle”, are available

name: Eggconsole Xanadu Scenario II PC-8801mkIISR
description: Sin descripción

name: Boosted Survivors
description:
Boosted Survivors is a sandbox rogue-like, filled to the brim with exciting secrets. Fight dangerous waves of enemies, find legendary upgrades, and boost your hero along the way.

Boosting lets you increase or decrease any value of your hero, weapons and abilities, giving you complete freedom to reinterpret the game in new and exciting ways. Every run is completely unique and limited only by your creativity.

name: Bubble Blaster DX
description: Pop, Bounce, and Conquer the Leaderboards in the Ultimate Bubble Blaster!

name: The First Descendant: Season 1
description:
Step into the action in The First Descendant’s thrilling Season 1 Update: Invasion starting August 29th!
Tackle new dungeons, unlock fresh content, and play as Hailey, the new sniper Descendant.

name: Micro Wars
description: Micro Wars is a fast-paced real time strategy game that throws you into the action in short, intense online battles featuring up to 8 players. Tailor your strategy with a variety of commanders and units, build your base, mine some minerals, and micro your way to victory. Hone your skills with the campaign and custom maps, and demonstrate your prowess to climb the ranks!

name: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Isekai Chronicles - DLC 1
description: Sin descripción

name: X Dash 3D
description: A classic game in which you have to overcome obstacles to reach the yellow point or finish line at the end of the map in a given time in the upper right corner.

name: DiggerSim: Excavator Simulator
description:
In this non-VR port, DiggerSim is a thrilling excavator and heavy equipment simulator that puts you in the driver's seat of a powerful excavator. With realistic controls, you'll feel like you're really operating heavy machinery.

In this game, you'll be tasked with completing a variety of excavation jobs, from digging foundations to clearing land. You'll have to carefully manoeuvre your excavator through tight spaces and navigate around obstacles to complete the level.

As you progress through the game, you'll have challenges that will test your skills and abilities. With immersive gameplay and realistic controls, Digger Sim is the ultimate experience for fans of construction and heavy machinery. So put on your hard hat and get ready to dig in!

name: Ninja I & II
description: Master the art of quick reflexes in Ninja I & II!

name: Panzer Corps 2: War Stories - Fall of Poland
description: An expansion for the WW2 turn-based strategy. In Panzer Corps 2: War Stories - Fall of Poland we can take control of Polish units during the German offensive in 1939. The add-on introduces various gameplay changes and the option to change real historical events.

name: EgoVersus: The First Strike
description: A fast-paced sci-fi first person shooter. Classic fps multiplayer, zombie mode (coming soon), and battle royale mode (coming soon) with rich story, and unique characters. EgoVersus: The First Strike aims to bring the old school FPS experience back to the modern gaming industry.

name: Jewel Match: Solitaire Seasons - Collector's Edition
description: For everything there is a season, and for every season there's Solitaire! Play more than 1000 levels across 10 locations in any season. Be sure to participate in the best Solitaire experience of this season and last. Shuffle your cards to victory with Jewel Match Solitaire Seasons!

name: Emio: The Smiling Man - Famicom Detective Club
description:
Explore an interactive drama full of interesting characters

Continue the adventures of the Utsugi Detective Agency with the return of familiar characters—including the returning protagonist from previous games, and Ayumi Tachibana, who is now playable in certain sections of the game for the first time in the series!

Playing as the investigative duo, you’ll need to learn a lot about the personalities and backstories of the other characters if you want to discover the truth. Who is harmless, and who is keeping important secrets? Ask questions, reference your notes, and make connections—you’ll have to order your thoughts and examine your leads carefully to draw the right conclusions.

name: Next of Kin
description: Next of Kin is an emotional story about Thomas's endeavors to find his lost wife, Martha. Solve puzzles, find clues, and uncover the truth of Martha's disappearance.

name: Unstoppable: Breakout
description: Unstoppable: Breakout is an immersive horror adventure where strategy, resource management, and courage are necessary if you want to survive. Escape the tower … if you can.

name: Death in Unison
description: Survive the world's deadliest psychopaths. Experience a unique 2-player co-op experience that puts your teamwork and communication to the test. Complete your duties alone or with a partner in a prison like no other.

name: Akimbot
description: In the action-adventure platformer, Akimbot, blast your way through armies of robots, pilot spaceships and forge your own path to save the universe from impending doom! Set in a sci-fi world where only robots exist, travel the galaxy and experience non-stop robot mayhem and explosive action!

name: Fallen
description: Description:This game is a psychic action game. Escape from the maze-like research facility by manipulating telekinesis, levitation, and teleportation.

name: Dungeon Divers
description: Dungeon Divers is a dungeon-themed puzzle game about clearing derelict dungeons. As the newest employee of Dungeon Divers Inc., you must advance through multiple procedural generated levels, use your wits, and tools you acquire along the way to get to the core to defuse it and bring home the cash.

name: Forklift Simulator
description: Start your career in logistics today in Forklift Simulator! Take on a variety of different missions, a selection of vehicles and an extensive career mode in which you can put your skills to the test. Are you ready for the challenges ahead?

name: Spectral Scream
description: "Spectral Scream", a horror party game is an online co-op horror game for 1-4 players. You need to survive the purgatory between life and death. Don't stop running from the ghosts attacking you. There's no time to be shaking in fear.

name: Monster Jam Showdown
description: To deliver the feeling and excitement of mastering 1,500 horsepower mechanical machines, Monster Jam Showdown will feature arcade gameplay endowed with comprehensive and customisable driving aids.

name: Maxwell's Puzzling Demon
description: "Thermodynamic" puzzle where Maxwell's demon does work of sokoban. Deal those hot blocks with cold blocks so that the demon doesn't get burnt.

name: Gundam Breaker 4
description: Create your own ultimate Gundam in the newest Gundam Breaker! With more customizable parts than ever before, you finally have the freedom to build your perfect Gunpla. Test it in battle using the brand new dual-weapon system and break parts off of your enemies and add them to your collection.

name: Leo the Firefighter Cat
description: Meet Leo, the courageous firefighter cat, and help him on his exciting adventure as a junior recruit at the fire station! Take on missions that get trickier each time and climb the ranks with the guidance of Commander Nox. Don't worry, you're not alone!

name: The Void Chronicles: One's Desolation
description: One day, Adele tells her daughter Liridona she's set up an arranged marriage with Prince Nathaniel. Everything seems to be going well between the two until Liridona hears something she shouldn't have from the prince. So, can she escape from Nathaniel's grasp or will she succumb to his persistence?

name: Visions of Mana
description: For the first time in over 15 years, a brand-new entry in the mainline Mana series arrives! Embark on a new adventure with Val, the newly appointed soul guard, as he sets off on a journey across the world to accompany his friend on her pilgrimage to the Tree of Mana. Experience action-packed gameplay and explore a vibrant semi-open 3D field, encountering fearsome foes and unlikely allies along the way.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit IV

name: Road to Exotics!
description: Arcade-inspired racing game, Cannon-Style! Race against up to 300 racers simultaneously, A unique perspective on arcade racing.

name: Minesweeper Collector 2
description: Minesweeper with a story and detailed tutorials! Each level you pass is an item that changes the game world and advances you through the storyline. You will find collections, crafting and level chains, it will be fun!

name: ColorCoordination
description: ColorCoordination is a puzzle game where you match colored blocks and spaces by moving them in unison. Explore deep, philosophical topics with your AI Assistant "CoCo" and discover more about its purpose - all while solving a myriad of colorful brainteasers!

name: Go Hell Go: Tsukiotoshiteko
description: Go Hell Go: Tsukiotoshiteko is an upcoming new RPG by Entergram.

name: Caesar's Revenge
description: Caesar’s Revenge is a single-player retro FPS set in classical antiquity. Bring retribution to the greedy senator’s that betrayed you. Become the fall of Rome.

name: Satellite Odyssey: Prologue
description: Satellite odyssey: Рrologue - is a short first-person story-driven adventure with horror elements. Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of classic science fiction and retro futurism, inspired by Soviet sci-fi films. Your partner is the artificial intelligence "Zarya"

name: Warcana
description: Warcana is a fantasy inspired base defence, RTS game with a deck-building mechanic. Face hundreds of thousands of unrelenting monsters in a battle royale between 30 other mighty magicians. Build your deck. Prepare your defences. Summon your armies. Survive the onslaught. Be the last one standing.

name: Memoriapolis
description: From Antiquity to the Age of Enlightenment, imagine, build and manage a city capable of spanning almost 2,500 years of history. Transform your explorers' camp into a world-renowned Capital. But beware: Each age brings its own challenges!

name: Call of Sentinels
description: Call of Sentinels is an exciting action game where you will have to challenge real evil! Epic battles await you with hordes of diverse enemies and charismatic bosses that will not leave you indifferent.

name: Shadow of the Ninja Reborn
description: After 34 years in the shadows, prepare to see this legendary action adventure in a new light! Looking and playing better than ever before, Shadow of the Ninja - Reborn is Tengo Project’s remake of a cult classic, that the fans have been waiting for.

name: Everlasting Flowers
description: Everlasting Flowers is the first installment in a series of "cinematic novels" that tells the story of two girls, Mina and Ran, and their struggles and growth as they search for their own approach to life.

name: Lost Balloons: Airy mates
description: "If only I could fly free in that sky..." This is a hard action-adventure game that should be played while holding on to the memories of those days of floating balloons with such thoughts in mind. Easy among the LOST object series by KIMIDORI SOFT, so it is recommended for first-time players.

name: Self Defense Kinda...
description: Use your brain to defeat several unique fights whether base game or custom community made content! Learn from your defeats and overcome your overwhelming foe in this Boss Rush RPG game! Maybe, you can help Alice escape the BR World and learn true Self Defense! eh, don't count on it.

name: Not For Broadcast: The Timeloop
description: The nation's first live televised science experiment is going to make you really happy.

name: Zombie Within
description: A Zombie imposter with virus vials slips into a survivor camp protected by a group of defenders and tries to kill the population. 2-6 players exciting social deduction with friends mixed with horror and strategy.

name: Lamina Island
description: The legendary hero trainer Evolym has taken on a new pupil. Being cursed as a slime, she will need your assistance. It is up to you to take the promising mage Neemu from zero to hero.

name: Squirrel with a Gun
description:
Squirrel with a Gun is a sandbox game that focuses on exploration and shooting combat.
Defend yourself from random encounters with Agents using various weapons. Deflect their melee attacks with exceptional timing to disarm them.
Climb and jump across platforms with your natural squirrel skill. Use weapon recoil to cross even greater gaps. Explore the neighbourhood from a squirrel's eye view.
Talk with residents of the neighbourhood and help them out for goodies. Or mug them for goodies.

name: Plank Builders
description: “Plank Builders” is a peaceful construction game. Magical marbles have the ability to make stuffed toys come alive. Together with the stuffed toys, the player can plan and construct different buildings made out of small wooden planks.

name: The Abandoned Planet
description: When a wormhole tears open in space, an astronaut is hurled down and crashes on a distant planet. But where is she? Where are all the inhabitants of the planet? And how is she going to get back home? Solve the puzzle and piece together the mystery in this 2D, pixel art, first person, point and click adventure.

name: Walter Walnut
description: Glide, collect nuts and slap birds in this small 3d adventure. Play as Walter Walnut, a gliding squirrel with a part time delivery job, and make your way to the delivery location.

name: Bloodless
description: Stylish retro, action-adventure game featuring fast-paced combat centered around ronin Tomoe's signature dash-counter mechanic, fighting with nothing but her bare fists to disarm her former allies, the samurai army of Shogun Akechi.

name: Cyberrrevolution
description: cybeRRRevolution (cyber-R-revolution) is an Indigenous action-adventure cyberpunk game about bartering with monsters, piloting godly mechas, and taking down bandits to secure a prosperous future for a nation of colonized peoples. Play as Sepsis, Rebel, or Barrett, each working toward a common goal of Recovery, Reconnection, and Rebuild.

name: Gori: Cuddly Carnage
description:
Are you ready for a third-person, hoverboarding hack & Slash with lots of blood, toys, glitter and adorable cuteness? Then Gori Cuddly Carnage is perfect for you!

Master explosive weaponry and devastating combos in an epic battle to prevent the Adorable Army from conquering the galaxy, and rescue Professor Y, their missing creator and only human who showed Gori and his friends love. Push your combat and platforming skills to the limits as you fight your way through twisted landscapes filled with environmental hazards, razor-sharp adult humour and a bone-crunching, pulse-pounding soundtrack.

These reluctant heroes must track down and obliterate the generals of the Adorable Army, and with the help of a wild cast of unlikely allies - discover the truth about Cool-Toyz Inc. and unravel the secrets of this thrilling, action-packed hack ‘n’ slash adventure. Get ready to unleash the cuddly carnage!

name: Cubic 2 3 4 Player Games
description: 35 Mini Party Games, Up to 4 player controller support, funny challenge with friends or family.

name: Age of Mythology: Retold - Premium Edition
description: Embark on a gaming journey of first-class offerings with the Age of Mythology: Retold Premium Edition. Curated to offer an elevated gaming experience at launch and beyond.

name: 100 Cats New York: Extra Content
description: Play a brand new level enriched with intricate details. 100 Cats have once again decided to hide themselves in New York.

name: Zephyr's Pass
description: Sin descripción

name: Rodeo Clown
description: Welcome to Aurora, TX. Stay a while and learn a thing or two about yourself.

name: Track Craft
description:
Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game that brings back the thrill of playing with toy cars,
with a twist. Build your own tracks, share them with friends, and race in a fully immersive
environment.
Players can race together in the same room, remotely, or on tracks created by others,
delivering a unique and dynamic experience. Immerse yourself in Mixed Reality (MR), where
your surroundings become part of the race, or switch to Virtual Reality (VR) for a classic,
high-speed thrill.
Developed primarily for Meta Quest 3, Track Craft has been praised by media, influencers,
and players during early access. The game is the debut title from Brainz Gamify, a creative
studio specializing in innovative mixed-reality games.

name: Cisini Stories
description: Cisini Stories is an engaging Android otome game designed to immerse you in a world of romance and adventure.

name: Super Nario World
description: Super Nario World is a hard 10 level rom hack which is centered around vanilla Super Mario World mechanics.
You are locked in a quiet apartment room. The only way out of the tightly closed door is to get to the truth of the case. Overcome your fear and try to escape.

name: Gundam Breaker 4: Season Pass
description: The Season Pass grants access to 5 Story Missions and a bonus DLC.

name: Snooker Blitz
description:
Play snooker friends for free in Snooker Blitz. The only online snooker game you ever need.

The world is ready for a truly unique snooker game! Challenge your friends, enter snooker tournaments, and go head to head against other players in real-time. Shoot snooker with ultra-realistic physics, breath-taking graphics, and have more fun than you’ve ever had in real life!

name: Rhapsody: A Musical Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Hoyeon
description: Hoyeon tells a story that takes place three years prior to Blade & Soul, featuring a trendy reinterpretation and a fresh look in a radiant world. In this collectible RPG, put together a composition of unique heroes and use Hoyeon's unique switching feature to play in both turn-based mode and field battle mode.

name: Difference
description: An officer who decided to take the subway home was trapped. Each time he returned to the same station, which is endlessly repeated, but something different from the original. You will need to detect and mark all the anomalies to get out.

name: Avatar: Realms Collide
description: Sin descripción

name: End Gate: The Last Passenger
description: You wake up, alone, in a hypersleep box, with no memories left. You find yourself in an enormous space station, orbiting with a strange asteroid, around a gigantic black hole. And now, it's time to search, everywhere, to understand who you were. And most importantly, what's left to do here.

name: Malum Escape
description: Experience a free co-op Escape Room set in the Malum universe. Trapped in an atmospheric horror house, you and your team must solve puzzles to escape. Will you make it out alive?

name: Genshin Impact: Flowers Resplendent on the Sun-Scorched Sojourn
description:
The fourth major update of Genshin Impact, known as Version 5.0, which includes:
• New characters: Mualani, Kinich, and Kachina
• New region, Natlan
• New gameplay mechanics: Saurian Indwelling and Nightsoul’s Blessing
• New main story quests: Archon Quest, Chapter V - Act I & II
• New quality of life features
• …and more!

name: Run, Sandwich, Run!
description: Sin descripción

name: The Other Side of the Sky
description: "The Other Side of the Sky" is a short text adventure game with an alternate fantasy setting in a single-line ending narrative mode.

name: Color of My Sound: Volume 1
description: Color of My Sound is an enthralling visual novel that combines elements of science fiction, espionage, drama, and eroticism. Immerse yourself in a captivating mystery as you navigate through the intricate web of character agendas, ambitions, and personal struggles.

name: Rangarok End Girls
description: Girls, resist the world and burn your lives! Full-voice stylish action!!

name: Gundam Breaker 4: Ultimate Edition
description:
The Ultimate Edition includes:
• GUNDAM BREAKER 4
• Deluxe Edition Bonus (Gunpla Parts Early Unlock - 15 Base Kits)
• Season Pass
- 5 Story Missions
- Season Pass Bonus (set of parts to recreate the Gunbarrel Strike Gundam - Gundam Breaker Ver.)
• Diorama Pack Set
- 4 Diorama Packs
- Diorama Pack Set Bonus (Gundam Breaker Series easel and poster set to display in Diorama Mode)

name: Gundam Breaker 4: Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
• GUNDAM BREAKER 4
• Deluxe Edition Bonus (Gunpla Parts Early Unlock - 15 Base Kits)
• Season Pass
- 5 Story Missions
- Season Pass Bonus (set of parts to recreate the Gunbarrel Strike Gundam - Gundam Breaker Ver.)

name: Chat Wars!
description: Chat Wars! is a real time strategy game playable only for a streamer with at least 30~40 viewers. Gather gold and upgrade chat viewer's Unit and spell for streamer! Collaborate with chat and streamers to win!

name: Rockhopper
description: Rockhopper is a single player asteroid mining rougelike featuring procedurally generated asteroids, robust upgrade paths and dark exploration with enemies and ancient secrets to uncover.

name: Mechanophagia
description: Mechanophagia is a challenging bullet hell shooter with roguelite elements, set in a dark and gritty sci-fi world. Blast through waves of fleshy aberrations and defeat monstrous bosses. Can you outmaneuver the relentless enemy onslaught and save the robots from their inevitable extinction?

name: 100 Cats Berlin
description: Find 100 Cats hidden in Berlin! Can you find them all?

name: 100 Cats New York
description: Find 100 Cats hidden in New York! Can you find them all?

name: Supermoves
description: Supermoves is the ultimate parkour showdown where you and your friends run, jump and grind rails to glory! Go head to head in Bomb Tag, reach the finish line before the Rising Tide or race up to 40 players in Royale. Make your own games and levels with our powerful tools. Never stop running.

name: CyberRush
description: Dive into CyberRush, an adrenaline-fueled blend of Subway Surfer and NFS. Race through procedurally generated Cyberpunk levels, evading police, blasting obstacles, and competing for highscores. Experience the rush of neon-lit streets in this fast-paced infinite runner

name: Goblin and Coins II: The Lost Recipes
description: A much easier stand-alone expansion to Goblin and Coins II. Use unlimited continues to run and double-jump through 25 handcrafted levels, and retrieve the recipes lost in the midnight raid from the original game.

name: Dark Galaxy
description: Dark Galaxy is an action based rogue-like top-down shooter. You pilot a space drone to oppose the insectoid like species called Minaripods and get stronger by travelling to different star systems. Can you free our galaxy from the invaders?

name: Haiyuuenchi no Memento Memoria
description: An abandoned amusement park in a broken world. It was a paradise called "Lagoon" where children were self-sufficient. A boy working as a mercenary in "Lagoon" happened to meet a silver-haired girl. The wheels of their destiny begin to move.

name: Run Away
description: Fight against nightmares and survive in a cooperative horror game for 1-3 players. Explore dark locations, and gather resources for survival. Your decisions determine the fate of the heroes and reveal the secrets of this sinister world. Only through teamwork can you conquer this nightmare.

name: Demon Loop
description: Take on the repeating Loop in this digital board game from the pen of renowned board game author Alexander Pfister! Protect humans from the monsters they had only recently called friends.Wield an increasing deck of cards to master strategy across each unique loop. Build and repair structures, rally villagers to your side and improve your own skills to overcome the demons running wild across the land.

name: PISTA Motorsport
description: Get behind the wheel! With realistic graphics and physics, a wide selection of Argentine racing cars, and various game modes, it provides an authentic and thrilling racing experience for enthusiasts.

name: Ninza
description:
Ninza is a multiplayer fighting game like no other! Instead of directly attacking your opponents, you crush them by pushing pieces of the level. Embrace chaos and dive into an entirely new level of frenzied and creative gameplay, where the environment itself becomes both your weapon and your ennemy.

Each character has a unique moveset and abilities, guaranteeing unexpected outcomes and thrilling comebacks in every battle. The game offers ample room for crafting creative strategies, tricks, and traps. But be warned, becoming a true Ninza master demands great determination. Only the boldest players can rise through the fierce competition and aspire to earn Mo0n's respect.

name: Ghost Girl Lasling
description: This is a story of Lasling, a talented genius teenage girl with amazing working abilities, who becomes a ghost after an accident. The only person in the world she is visible to is Mofft, the male main protagonist. Their meeting is as if a fateful encounter and love story begins.

name: Indie Dev Story
description:
Quit your job to become an indie developer and make your first game!

A short single-player 'clicker' game which tries to mimic the frantic feeling of being an indie developer; make your game while trying to stay healthy, social and earning enough money to pay the bills.

How will your game do when it releases?

name: Life as Designed
description: A feeling of being typecast and a dwindling motivation to work leaves Cho Fukuda questioning her career as a freelance costume designer. To get out of this rut, Cho and her girlfriend search for a new calling she can devote herself to.

name: Star Command Galaxies
description: Star Command Galaxies is the ultimate starship simulator. Become Captain and recruit your crew, build your ship, explore a randomly generated universe and battle alien ships across the galaxy.

name: Smite 2: Deluxe Founder's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Smite 2: Founder's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Smite 2: Ultimate Founder's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: My Sweet! Housemate
description: My Sweet Housemate is an interactive visual novel style game that puts you into the shoes of a homeless adult struggling to find affordable housing in America. You're hit with a stroke of good - or maybe bad - luck when you finally find a totally not suspicious rental listing for a room in an apartment. The only catch is that your new landlord, Seung-min, seems to have something off about him.

name: Steamboat Willie's Super Willie World
description: Join Steamboat Willie on a 1920s-style platforming adventure across 40 levels!

name: JR East Train Simulator: Utsunomiya Line (Kuroiso to Tokyo) E233-3000 series
description:
Utsunomiya Line is the nickname for trains operating on the 163.3 km long section of the Tohoku Line (between Tokyo Station and Morioka Station) between Tokyo Station and Kuroiso Station. The Utsunomiya Line has been in use since March 10, 1990, at the suggestion of the local governments along the line. In the past, many express and sleeper trains headed for Tohoku and Hokkaido used to run on the line, but now regular and rapid trains make up the majority of the schedule.
Please enjoy the Utsunomiya Line DLC as you travel through the Kanto Plain, experiencing the changing landscape from Tochigi Prefecture to Tokyo, with its sprawling countryside, suburban residential areas, and buildings in the heart of the city.

name: Night Drive
description: Welcome to "Night Drive," a driving simulator that challenges you to navigate a seemingly endless night in search of anomalies to break a mysterious loop.

name: Magic Castle
description: Embark on an enchanting journey in

name: Risk of Rain 2 + Survivors of the Void + Seekers of the Storm Bundle
description: Unleash the critically acclaimed Risk of Rain 2 and its first two expansions! This bundle includes Risk of Rain 2, the Survivors of the Void DLC, and the Seekers of the Storm DLC.

name: Abnormal Stairs
description: "Abnormal Stairs" is a game where you go down the stairs while looking for abnormalities.

name: Disney Speedstorm: PlayStation Plus Exclusive Pack
description:
This pack includes:
- Baloo Wildboost Logo Avatar
- Baloo Sterling Legacy Suit
- Baloo Wildboost Sterling Edition Livery

name: Zombie Fall: Survival Challenge
description: Sin descripción

name: Street Drag Racing Car Driving Simulator: Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Perplexing Orb: Bounce Challenge
description: Sin descripción

name: Pileup
description: In PILEUP you play as a green square that is trying to rise up by substituting gray squares underneath it. Since reaching the top of the green square will end the game, you must prevent it from rising. Pink rectangles will fall from above and destroy all the blocks in their path, including you. Dodge them to live as long as possible and earn more points.

name: Haunted Castle
description:
A port of Haunted Castle included in "Castlevania Dominus Collection."

Count Dracula sleeps for a long hundred of years. During this time, peace exists at the village and Dracula is nothing but a mere legend.

However, one day a young couple named Simon and Serena were celebrating their wedding at the village's church.

The couple were enveloped with happiness, as the wedding bells rang, their future seemed blessed...

Suddenly, the empty sky was covered with dark clouds and with a rolling thunder that shook the earth, Dracula has once again awakened. Asking for the beautiful girl's blood, he flew down during the middle of the wedding and suddenly took the bride with him.

Now in order to save Serena, Simon heads to the demon castle

name: Gulping Snake
description: Gulping Snake is a simple, but not easy, 2D puzzle game.

name: Castlevania: Order of Ecclesia
description:
A port of Castlevania: Order of Ecclesia included in "Castlevania Dominus Collection."

Use the brand new Glyph system with over 100 different attack combinations to battle Dracula and his minions throughout 20 explorable areas! Take part in side quests and collect items to power up! Experience a gripping storyline featuring new characters!

In the absence of the Holy Whip, those who live in fear of Dracula seek a replacement, which takes the form of the Order of Ecclesia, an organization that holds the secret to manipulating Glyphs. Shanoa, a young woman possessed with a unique ability to channel Glyphs, is chosen as our protector. This is her destiny and the story of the sacred Order of Ecclesia.

name: Castlevania: Portrait of Ruin
description:
A port of Castlevania: Portrait of Ruin included in "Castlevania Dominus Collection."

Explore exotic locales through portals created by the lord of the castle! Switch characters in the heat of action or fight side-by-side using the abilities of both heroes! Battle hordes of enemies and huge bosses in the quest to vanquish evil!

An ancient vampire threatens the fate of the world by utilizing Dracula's accursed castle and mystical paintings to open portals of Death. Battle together as Jonathan Morris, a young man who wields the legendary whip Vampire Killer, and Charlotte Aulin, a spellcaster with tremendous magical abilities. It's time to conquer evil in man's darkest hour.

name: Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow
description:
A port of Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow included in "Castlevania Dominus Collection."

Draw the correct magic seal quickly, or your enemies will never die! Fight and explore through one of the largest castles ever seen in the series! Race another player through custom-made castle rooms in versus mode!

A year has passed since Soma Cruz discovered the evil of Dracula hidden inside his body. Now, a mysterious cult wants to release the power of the Lord of Darkness. As Soma, you must do everything in your power to stop them before it's too late.

name: Minecraft: Stampy's Lovely World
description:
The official map of Stampy’s Lovely World. A place that was built over ten years and has been seen by millions.
Explore the town, play in the funland and experience the places where countless stories have been told.

• Includes 100+ attractions in Stampy’s Funland!
• Visit the town and discover its many shops and activities!
• Explore locations where memories were made!

name: A Light Jog
description: A Light Jog is a 2D endless runner game with 4 different places to travel through as you, the player, jog as long as you can while passing hazards that could stop you.

name: Zero Zero: Perfect Stop
description: Zero Zero: Perfect Stop is a train driving game for Playdate where you use the crank to control the train's throttle and brakes. Stop in the right place, at the right time. Maintain your timetable as you glide through scenic Yamanashi.

name: Haunted Castle Revisited
description:
Haunted Castle Revisited, a redesigned version of the very first Castlevania arcade game, makes its debut!

The game was released within the Castlevania Dominus Collection.

name: Destiny 2: Echoes - Act 3
description: Confront the Conductor. Solve the mystery and put an end to the twisted machinations fighting for control of the Echoes.

name: Doraemon Dorayaki Shop Story
description:
A game where you run a sweets shop with the popular manga character Doraemon. Let's make Doraemon's favorite dorayaki and create a store that will be the talk of the town.

First, make the sweets, set up the shelves, prepare the tables, and get ready to run the shop. In addition, various characters from Fujiko・F・Fujio's works will appear as customers.

name: Animal Tower Battle
description: A fun and easy battle game for all ages, with simple rules and controls, playable online and offline!

name: Castlevania Dominus Collection
description: Three incredible action adventure games from the Castlevania series have finally returned, for the first time! But wait, there's more! Haunted Castle Revisited, a redesigned version of the very first Castlevania arcade game, makes its debut!
